headline: Taking a Fresh Look at ServiceNow (NOW) Valuation After Recent Market Moves
summary: ServiceNow (NOW) likely caught your eye after its latest move in the market left investors wondering what comes next. There has not been a headline-grabbing event driving the recent action, but even these quieter shifts can signal something bubbling under the surface. When a stock with a big footprint in enterprise software wobbles, it is only natural to pause and consider whether this represents a warning sign or just the noise of daily trading. Looking at the broader picture, ServiceNow...
